text: please behold

miserable.

[ Thunder rumbles ]

The name of our first game
is Misery Lane.

So, I'm gonna put two markers
on the index,
and the first one is...

You find out via Venmo
that your partner is cheating,
which our shrinks rated at a 68.
And the second one is...

Your Chinese symbol tattoo
means "big load."
[ Laughter, groans ]

Which our shrinks
only rated a 45.

Okay, so I'm gonna show you
each an event.

the exact number,

just if it falls above,
below, or in between

the two cards
that are on the index.

Great.
Check out this misery.

all the way down and back.
